sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0430 ( DPOB_CD , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_OVR , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_UDR , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# , #pyspLogSvcYrNumCd# , #logSvcYrNumOvr# , #logSvcYrNumUdr# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0430 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# , PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd# , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_OVR=#logSvcYrNumOvr# , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_UDR=#logSvcYrNumUdr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM PAYR0430 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum#
PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_OVR , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_UDR , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0430 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , AA.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , BB.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , AA.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_OVR , BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_UDR , BB.KYBDR , BB.INPT_DT , BB.INPT_ADDR , BB.ISMT , BB.REVN_DT , BB.REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0400 AA, PAYR0430 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum#
AA.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD ASC , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ASC , BB.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
) A )

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , AA.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , BB.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , AA.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(A.DPOB_CD,A.TYP_OCCU_CD,A.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_OVR , BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_UDR , BB.KYBDR , BB.INPT_DT , BB.INPT_ADDR , BB.ISMT , BB.REVN_DT , BB.REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0400 AA, PAYR0430 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum#
AA.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , COMM_CD , RPSTTV_CD , DTL_CD , COMM_CD_NM , ABBR_NM , ENG_NM , MANGE_ITEM01 , MANGE_ITEM02 , MANGE_ITEM03 , MANGE_ITEM04 , MANGE_ITEM05 , MANGE_ITEM06 , MANGE_ITEM07 , MANGE_ITEM08 , MANGE_ITEM09 , MANGE_ITEM10 , MANGE_ITEM11 , MANGE_ITEM12 , MANGE_ITEM13 , MANGE_ITEM14 , MANGE_ITEM15 , MANGE_ITEM16 , MANGE_ITEM17 , MANGE_ITEM18 , MANGE_ITEM19 , MANGE_ITEM20 , CD_TREE_LVL , ORD , OPN_YN , USE_YN , NOTE , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS0300 WHERE OPN_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MANGE_ITEM11 IS NOT NULL AND MANGE_ITEM12 IS NOT NULL
RPSTTV_CD = #rpsttvCd#
TO_NUMBER(NVL(MANGE_ITEM01,'9999')) <= ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(NVL(MANGE_ITEM01,'0')) FROM BASS0300 WHERE OPN_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MANGE_ITEM11 IS NOT NULL AND MANGE_ITEM12 IS NOT NULL
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
RPSTTV_CD = #rpsttvCd#
COMM_CD = #commCd#
)
COMM_CD_NM LIKE '%' || #commCdNm# || '%'
MANGE_ITEM01=#mangeItem01#
MANGE_ITEM02=#mangeItem02#
MANGE_ITEM03=#mangeItem03#
MANGE_ITEM04=#mangeItem04#
MANGE_ITEM05=#mangeItem05#
MANGE_ITEM06=#mangeItem06#
MANGE_ITEM07=#mangeItem07#
MANGE_ITEM08=#mangeItem08#
MANGE_ITEM09=#mangeItem09#
MANGE_ITEM10=#mangeItem10#
MANGE_ITEM11=#mangeItem11#
MANGE_ITEM12=#mangeItem12#
MANGE_ITEM13=#mangeItem13#
MANGE_ITEM14=#mangeItem14#
MANGE_ITEM15=#mangeItem15#
MANGE_ITEM16=#mangeItem16#
MANGE_ITEM17=#mangeItem17#
MANGE_ITEM18=#mangeItem18#
MANGE_ITEM19=#mangeItem19#
MANGE_ITEM20=#mangeItem20#
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD ASC , ORD ASC , COMM_CD ASC
) A )
